Key Match Events: The Bucks are 6.5-point road favorites against the Grizzlies, and the total is set at 232.
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee has limped to a 1-3 record to start the year, but they still feature a pair of stars in Giannis Antetokounmpo and Damian Lillard.
Memphis hasn't gotten off to a hot start either, carrying a 2-3 record into tonight's game.
The Grizzlies did get Ja Morant back last night, but they're expected to be without several key rotation pieces.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thursday's action tips off at 8:10pm ET when the Milwaukee Bucks take on the Memphis Grizzlies.
